item.description:
Note: the new date for this event is now Sunday the 21st.   

We continue the next chapter in our quest for the perfect cheeseburger.  But before hand, we'll get some exercise and explore the Boston Public Garden park.    Swan boats anyone?

We'll meet at the bronze statue of George Washington on horseback. This on the side of the Boston Public Garden closest to the theater district. (Arlington st) Use the power of the Internet for the exact location. Please try to be on time. 1PM. After exploring the park, we'll seeK out our cheeseburger reward at UBurger. 

Who makes the best cheeseburger? This time we put UBurger to the challenge. (140 Tremont Street). And maybe a milkshake, too.   

Date subject to change and the weather.
item.how_to_find_us: The secret rendezvous place is the. George Washington statue.
item.name: Cheeseburger, cheeseburger, cheeseburger & Boston Garden Walk
